name: node_farm
description: The 'Node Farm' project is a dynamic web application powered by Node.js that offers a virtual farm experience. It showcases a variety of farm products through interactive product cards, each linking to detailed information about the product. The application utilizes server-side rendering and templates to create seamless user experiences, and it includes an API for easy integration of product data. Whether you're a developer honing your Node.js skills or a user exploring farm products, 'Node Farm' provides an engaging and educational platform.
author: Niroop R
